Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh and South Africa will play their fifth fixture of the 2023 World Cup at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai on Tuesday.
The Bangla Tigers have had an up and down tournament so far, with a clinical show against Afghanistan followed by three losses to England, New Zealand, and India.

South Africa began their campaign by racking up a World Cup-record 428/5 against Sri Lanka, securing a 102-run victory, and then beating Australia by 134 runs. Despite a shock loss to the Netherlands, they bounced back strongly to beat England by 229 runs at the same venue.
The ICC World Cup 2023 game between Bangladesh and South Africa is scheduled to start at 14:00 (IST) (+5:30 GMT).
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023, and the match will be broadcasted live in multiple languages across the Star Sports Network.
The live streaming of the game between Bangladesh and South Africa will be available on Disney+ Hotstar, free of cost for mobile users.
